title: Chapter 8
content: There was absolute silence in Wienis' chambers when the image of PrinceLefkin appeared at the televisor. There had been one startled gasp from theregent at the haggard face and shredded uniform of his son, and then hecollapsed into a chair, face contorted with surprise and apprehension. \n\n Hardin listened stolidly, hands clasped lightly in his lap, while thejust-crowned King Lepold sat shriveled in the most shadowy comer, bitingspasmodically at his goldbraided sleeve. book.description: 简介： 1966年擊敗了「魔戒」系列，奪得世界科幻大會雨果獎「永遠最佳系列小說」延續已達一萬二千年，統領疆域廣達數百萬星球的古老銀河帝國，正在緩慢的步上無可挽回的衰亡之路。哈里．謝頓 (Hari Seldon) --未來史學的創造者，計算出在銀河帝國滅亡後隨之而來的將是長達三萬...
